amendment.description: To authorize the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to authorize general aviation airport sponsors to allocate mineral revenues not needed to carry out 5-year projected airport maintenance needs for other transportation infrastructure projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 57 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 57 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S830-833; text: CR S831-832) To authorize the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to authorize general aviation airport sponsors to allocate mineral revenues not needed to carry out 5-year projected airport maintenance needs for other transportation infrastructure projects.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 57 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 57 proposed by Senator Hutchison.
